main.advanced_options_should_not_click: Cannot modify advanced settings during use
main.connect_error: An error occurred, please try reconnecting
main.connect_microphone_error: Error accessing the microphone, please grant permission and try again
main.is_connecting_warning: Currently connecting, please stop the connection before switching functions
main.less_than_min_hangup_time: Save failed, the maximum auto hang-up time setting cannot be less than 0
main.over_idle_time: Idle time is too long, call has been automatically hung up
main.over_max_hangup_time: Save failed, the maximum auto hang-up time setting cannot exceed 1 hour
main.place_holder_personality: You can enter multiple values, separated by spaces
main.sub_title_auto_hang_up: Automatically hang up when the connection time exceeds the set value, in seconds, 0 to disable auto hang-up
main.sub_title_hang_up_when_space: Automatically hang up when excessive idle time is detected
